tool.name: Dlib Face Recoginition
tool.description: Train with a set of images of known faces and recognize unknown faces in a video

param.name: input_video
param.label: Input Video
param.help: An input video file for shot detection

param.name: threshold
param.label: (Optional) Threshold
param.help: Sensitivity of the shot detection. The default is 30

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Train Face Recognition with a set of photos of known faces and run Face Recognition on a video to identify unknown faces using the training results.
